LiquidityProviderFill(address,address,ui.details: An optional event an LP can emit for each fill against a source.

params.inputTokenAmount: How much input token was sold.
params.outputTokenAmount: How much output token was bought.
params.recipient: The recipient of the output tokens.
params.sourceAddress: An optional address associated with the source (e.g, a curve pool).
params.sourceId: A bytes32 encoded ascii source ID. E.g., `bytes32('Curve')`/

getSellQuote(address,address,uint256).details: Quotes the amount of `outputToken` that would be obtained by      selling `sellAmount` of `inputToken`.

params.inputToken: Address of the taker token (what to sell). Use        the wETH address if selling ETH.
params.outputToken: Address of the maker token (what to buy). Use        the wETH address if buying ETH.

returns.outputTokenAmount: Amount of `outputToken` that would be obtained.

sellEthForToken(address,address,uint256,.details: Trades ETH for token. ETH must either be attached to this function      call or sent to the contract prior to calling this function to      trigger the trade.

params.auxiliaryData: Arbitrary auxiliary data supplied to the contract.
params.minBuyAmount: The minimum acceptable amount of `outputToken` to buy.
params.recipient: The recipient of the bought tokens.

sellTokenForEth(address,address,uint256,.details: Trades token for ETH. The token must be sent to the contract prior      to calling this function to trigger the trade.

params.auxiliaryData: Arbitrary auxiliary data supplied to the contract.
params.minBuyAmount: The minimum acceptable amount of ETH to buy.
params.recipient: The recipient of the bought tokens.

sellTokenForToken(address,address,addres.details: Trades `inputToken` for `outputToken`. The amount of `inputToken`      to sell must be transferred to the contract prior to calling this      function to trigger the trade.

params.auxiliaryData: Arbitrary auxiliary data supplied to the contract.
params.minBuyAmount: The minimum acceptable amount of `outputToken` to buy.
params.recipient: The recipient of the bought tokens.
